about_the_game:
The world of Riddledale is filled with fantastic creatures and wizards. Follow Wilburn as he returns to his hometown after years abroad. Meet Ralph, your new companion, and embark on a quest to solve the riddle of the crystals. As he explores the island, Wilburn will soon discover that the place where he grew up changed during the years and that a dangerous secret now lies under the island.









Riddledale is a new open-world adventure centered around story and characters. Solve riddles, make fun encounters and fight ferocious creatures on a vast island full of secrets.





Riddledale is filled with monsters and foes. You need to be swift to defeat your enemies, but mostly, you need to be prepared. Get rest, plan your expeditions and gather food before venturing forth. Various spells and weapons will help you defend yourself against dangerous enemies. 





Collecting resources is crucial. It allows you to brew magic potions, to cook delicious meals and to craft exciting new tools and weapons. Some of the items you craft will help you solve hidden quests or discover new unexplored locations. 





Riddledale is centered around story-telling. The world and characters evolve as the story progresses, but also do your relations with your friends. Dialogues and quests will guide you in your journey but exploring the island will always lead you to new fun and weird encounters. 









Riddledale is a volcanic island in the middle of the sea, located between the western and the eastern kingdoms. Ancient ruins from an extinct civilization still cover the island but its fall remains unsolved. In more recent years, the town of Riddledale has grown to become a prime touristic destination and its new mining operations are rapidly putting back the forgotten island on the maps. 









Follow Riddledale on social medias and visit the official website to learn more about the game. Join the community and get a chance to playtest the game.
